# Pentagon Test

## Our Smart Contract Address in Pentagon Games

- **OrandProviderContract**: [0x88f9c4daba3dd7bbbC5b773E97F9e3A2A600085f](https://github.com/orochi-network/smart-contracts/blob/main/contracts/orand-v3/OrandProviderV3.sol)  
  **Source Code**: [OrandProviderV3.sol](https://github.com/orochi-network/smart-contracts/blob/main/contracts/orand-v3/OrandProviderV3.sol)

- **ConsumerContract**: [DiceGameV3 Contract](https://explorer-testnet.pentagon.games/address/0x540AF102792020f7f300a3AF4fF52af1B71BfF69?tab=contract)

---

## Initial Setup

```bash
yarn install
```

## Prepare environment variables

```

WALLET_PRIVATE_KEY=string

RPC_URL=https://rpc-testnet.pentagon.games

ORAND_PROVIDER_ADDRESS=0x88f9c4daba3dd7bbbC5b773E97F9e3A2A600085f

```

## Run this project

```

yarn dev

```

## Result

An error will occur, displaying the following result:


## Information

The error code failed at this line: https://github.com/orochi-network/smart-contracts/blob/ecc2575ab4da52d0f50d02cca6dd34974d0100f6/contracts/libraries/VRF.sol#L167

It seems that your blockchain doesn't have the required precompiled contracts.
